lines: WHAT A FRIEND WE HAVE IN JESUS!
Ndajana mwenzuma mwini, Wa ndi yanda sansinya;
Ne ndi taningamu yanda, Wa ndi angaluyando;
Wa uzambaila moyo Intambo ya luyando,
Ndi li kwakwe u li kwangu, Kwangu o kutamani.
Nda jana mwenzuma mwini, O wa ka ndi yasilwa;
Wa ka ndi pa kufutuka O lwakwe mwini Jesu
Kunyina nce nda Ômba cangu, Nkwe ndi jisi nku kwakwe
Moyo a inguzu zyangu Nzi zyakwe kutamani.
Nda jana mwenzuma mwini, Wa pegwa nguzu zyonse,
Zya ku ndi enzya munzila, Ndi ka sike kujulu,
Colwe ci la mweka munzi, Ci la ndi buzya calo;
Lino nda nyona, nda lwana, Ndi la ku lyokezya ko.
